override void OnInitialized ()
Properties
RenderFragment< IAbsolutePath?>? HeaderRenderFragment [get, set]
Receives the _selectedAbsolutePath as a parameter to the RenderFragment.
RenderFragment< IAbsolutePath?>? FooterRenderFragment [get, set]
Receives the _selectedAbsolutePath as a parameter to the RenderFragment.
string BodyClassCssString = null! [get, set]
One would likely use BodyClassCssString in the case where either HeaderRenderFragment or FooterRenderFragment are being used. This is due to one likely wanting to set a fixed height for the HeaderRenderFragment and a fixed height for the FooterRenderFragment and lastly the body gets a fixed height of calc(100% - HeightForHeaderRenderFragment - HeightForFooterRenderFragment);.
string BodyStyleCssString = null! [get, set]
One would likely use BodyStyleCssString in the case where either HeaderRenderFragment or FooterRenderFragment are being used.
